title: The Last Trumpet
verses:
1. O get your hearts in order, order, order; O
get your hearts in order for the end of time;
For Gabriel's going to blow, by and by, by and
by, For Gabriel's going to blow, by and by.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the need for spiritual preparation for the end times when Gabriel will sound the last trumpet, a key theme in Adventist eschatology
